structure_rules.change_definition: Visual subject, text, and rhythm/tempo must change every beat

beats.visual: Close-up of stylish woman looking at herself in a full-length mirror adjusting her sneakers.
beats.transition: Whip pan transition from mirror to next scene.

beats.visual: Focus on the sneakers as the woman steps out confidently on an urban street.
POV shot of woman stepping onto a bus – focus on feet.
beats.rhythm_editing: Smooth flow transition to emphasize movement.

beats.visual: Side view of woman walking past reflective building, checking reflection.
Footage of different women trying the shoes, smiling, and showing them off.
Close-up of sneakers with outfit shots, focusing on details like laces and sole.

beats.sfx_music: Music slows slightly to highlight items

beats.visual: Woman clicks 'buy' on phone, smiles at screen, with product and price overlay.

beats.sfx_music: Final beat hit with fade out

production_notes: Use natural lighting for authenticity and warmth.
Ensure captions are clear and readable on mobile displays.
Switch between wide and close-up shots to add depth.
Incorporate upbeat, catchy tracks fitting urban styles.
Voiceover should be friendly and inviting, matching target demographic.
Showcase diverse personas wearing the sneakers for relatability.
Maintain a consistent color scheme for brand identity.
Integrate trendy urban locations to appeal to young audience.

structure_rules.cadence_rule: 3–3–3 cadence: every 3 seconds (each beat) MUST change at least 2 of: (a) Visual subject/composition, (b) On-screen text message (new info), (c) Rhythm/tempo/editing.
structure_rules.change_definition: Visual: camera angles, subject focus, props. Text: highlights, new points, symbols. Rhythm: tempo changes, cut styles, speed variations.

beats.visual: Close-up of uncomfortable walking in regular sneakers, grimacing face.
Reveal of Tenis Barbara on a clean background, focus on sleek design.
beats.rhythm_editing: Slow motion twist of the shoe.

beats.visual: Foot pressing into memory foam, showing it bounce back slowly.
beats.transition: Fade to white, reveal next scene

beats.visual: View of thick sole against urban pavement, with person confidently walking.
beats.rhythm_editing: Time-lapse of walking through city streets.

beats.visual: Model showing off the shoes with various outfits.
beats.transition: Snap cut with each outfit change

beats.visual: People smiling while wearing the sneakers, engaging in daily activities.
Product close-up with details of the shoe and guarantee text.

production_notes: Use natural lighting to emphasize product texture and wearability.
Include captions for clarity in sound-off environments.
Balance scenes with upbeat background music that matches the voiceover tone.
Focus on diverse settings to demonstrate versatility and comfort in different daily scenarios.
Employ different camera angles to highlight shoe details.
Utilize models that reflect the target demographic - young, active professionals.
Incorporate trendy edits like quick transitions and zooms for engagement.
Ensure text blocks are concise and easy to read within short durations.

compliance_notes: Ensure all claims are focused on product versatility, avoid stating 'guarantee happiness' without proof.
Do not directly state 'limited edition' or 'exclusive' if not applicable. Emphasize availability terms as 'según disponibilidad'.
Avoid any exaggerated claims about durability without specified evidence.
All text on screen must be legible and match time constraints for reading comfortably.
Ensure background music and voice-over are balanced to maintain clarity.
